Edy
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: lordofkoriyama04 
  To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, June 22, 2004 3:54 PM
  Subject: [samuraihistory] Books on the Samurai


  Hello! 

  I've been a member of the group for a while but I don't post messages 
  often. 

  Can anyone tell me where's a good website for buying books on famous 
  samurai? In particular the Sengoku daimyos. 

  Individual biographies are good but what I'm after is a book that 
  details the history of the major Sengoku clans (ie 10-15 pages on 
  each house):

  Tokugawa
  Oda
  Hojo
  Shimazu
  Otomo
  Mori
  Takeda
  Uesugi

  Also, if anyone knows of a biography of Mori Motonari (my favourite 
  Sengoku warlord) then could you please let me know. It'd have to be 
  an English version of course as I don't read Japanese. 

  I've looked on Amazon but they only seem to have biographies on 
  Tokugawa Ieyasu and Toyotomi Hideyoshi and I've read books on both of 
  them!

  Thanks

  Neil
